name: C-Lab Alpha1.00
description:
Hello everyone, 

Before I explain about this game, let me introduce myself a little bit.
I'm a 15 year old high school student that started studying unity a month ago. 
I just wanted to share my progress on the first game I have ever made.

C-Lab is a VR game based on Chemistry.

In the world of C-Lab you are able to generate elements using a periodic table and combine them to create a compound.
Currently there are 6 compounds that can be made, featuring:
H2, O2, H2O, CO2, HCL, H2CO3

The game is still a work in progress and have a lot of glitches, so I expect you guys to give me heartwarming comments and advice.

With appreciation,
C-Lab team
